properties.message_text: Поздравляем, заказ ${order_short_id} выполнен! Вы записаны ${commentary} в Кабину Красоты Ile De Beaute в магазине ${store_name}, по адресу: ${store_address}. Контактный телефон ${contact_phone} . С Вас списано 3000 бонусов.

properties.SQL Query:
UPDATE orders
SET
	order_status = '${order_status}'
	,last_updated_by = '${source}'
WHERE order_short_id = '${order_short_id}'

SELECT
	order_short_id
	,order_status
	,order_created_at
	,updated_at
	,last_updated_by
from orders
where
	order_short_id = '${order_short_id}'
select * from order_status_history where status_long_id = '${status_long_id}'
SELECT status_long_id from order_status_history where status_id = last_insert_rowid();
properties.sql-pre-query:
INSERT INTO order_status_history (
    order_short_id,
    status_long_id,
    status_code,
    status_name,
    source,
    additional_info,
    commentary,
    status_created_at,
    status_created_timezone
)
VALUES (
    '${order_short_id}',
    '${status_long_id}',
    '${status_code}',
    '${status_name}',
    '${source}',
    '${additional_info}',
    '${commentary}',
    '${status_created_at}',
    '${status_created_timezone}'
);

properties.SQL Query: SELECT payment_short_id from payments where payment_id = last_insert_rowid();
properties.sql-pre-query:
INSERT INTO payments (
    order_short_id,
	payment_long_id,
	payment_short_id,
    payment_method,
    amount,
    payment_status,
	client_phone,
	attributes,
	payment_created_at,
    source
) 
VALUES (
    '${order_short_id}',
    '${payment_long_id}',
    '${payment_short_id}',
	'${payment_method}',
    ${amount},
    '${payment_status}',
	'${client_phone}',
    '${attributes}',
    '${payment_created_at}',
    '${source}'
);

properties.SQL Query: select * from payments where payment_short_id = '${payment_short_id}'

SELECT
	confirmation_id,
    confirmation_long_id,
    confirmation_short_id,
    payment_short_id,
    order_short_id,
    client_phone,
    send_code,
    entered_code,
    confirmation_status,
    attempts,
    max_attempts,
    expiration_time,
    confirmed_at,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    source,
    last_updated_by
from payment_confirmations
where
	confirmation_short_id = '${confirmation_short_id}'

UPDATE payment_confirmations
SET
	confirmation_status = '${action}'
	,entered_code = '${entered_code}'
	,last_updated_by = '${source}'
WHERE confirmation_short_id = '${confirmation_short_id}'

select
    confirmation_id,
	confirmation_long_id,
	confirmation_short_id,
    payment_short_id,
    order_short_id,
    client_phone,
    send_code,
    entered_code,
    confirmation_status,
    attempts,
    max_attempts,
    created_at,
    expiration_time,
    confirmed_at from payment_confirmations
where confirmation_status = '${confirmation_status}'

select
    confirmation_id,
	confirmation_long_id,
	confirmation_short_id,
    payment_short_id,
    order_short_id,
    client_phone,
    send_code,
    entered_code,
    confirmation_status,
    attempts,
    max_attempts,
    created_at,
    expiration_time,
    confirmed_at from payment_confirmations
where confirmation_long_id = '${confirmation_long_id}'
SELECT confirmation_long_id from payment_confirmations where confirmation_id = last_insert_rowid();
properties.sql-post-query:
UPDATE payment_confirmations 
SET confirmation_short_id = 
    (SELECT payment_short_id FROM payment_confirmations WHERE confirmation_id = last_insert_rowid()) || 
    '-' || 
    last_insert_rowid(),
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE confirmation_id = last_insert_rowid();
properties.sql-pre-query:
INSERT INTO payment_confirmations (
    confirmation_long_id,
    payment_short_id,
    order_short_id,
    client_phone,
    send_code,
    confirmation_status,
    expiration_time,
    created_at
)
VALUES (
    '${confirmation_long_id}',
    '${payment_short_id}',
    '${order_short_id}', 
    '${client_phone}',
    '${send_code}',
    '${confirmation_status}',
    datetime('now', '+3 minutes'),
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

properties.SQL Query:
SELECT
    confirmation_id,
    confirmation_long_id,
    confirmation_short_id,
    payment_short_id,
    order_short_id,
    client_phone,
    send_code,
    entered_code,
    confirmation_status,
    attempts,
    max_attempts,
    expiration_time,
    confirmed_at,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    source,
    last_updated_by
FROM payment_confirmations
WHERE order_short_id = '${order_short_id}'

select  
    *
from payments as payments
where payment_status = '${payment_status}'
SELECT payment_long_id from payment_status_history where status_id = last_insert_rowid();
properties.sql-pre-query:
INSERT INTO payment_status_history (
	status_long_id,
	payment_short_id,
    order_short_id,
    payment_long_id,
    status_code,
    status_name,
    source,
    additional_info,
    commentary,
    status_created_at,
    status_created_timezone
)
VALUES (
    '${status_long_id}',
    '${payment_short_id}',
    '${order_short_id}',
    '${payment_long_id}',
    '${status_code}',
    '${status_name}',
    '${source}',
    '${additional_info}',
    '${commentary}',
    '${status_created_at}',
    '${status_created_timezone}'
);

properties.SQL Query: select * from payment_status_history where status_long_id = '${status_long_id}'
select * from payments where payment_short_id = '${payment_short_id}'

UPDATE payments SET
	payment_status = '${payment_status}',
	last_updated_by = '${source}'
WHERE
	payment_short_id = '${payment_short_id}'

UPDATE payment_confirmations
SET
	confirmation_status = '${action}'
	,send_code = '${send_code}'
	,last_updated_by = '${source}'
WHERE confirmation_short_id = '${confirmation_short_id}'

SELECT
	confirmation_id,
    confirmation_long_id,
    confirmation_short_id,
    payment_short_id,
    order_short_id,
    client_phone,
    send_code,
    entered_code,
    confirmation_status,
    attempts,
    max_attempts,
    expiration_time,
    confirmed_at,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    source,
    last_updated_by
from payment_confirmations
where
	confirmation_short_id = '${confirmation_short_id}'

select  
    stores.store_id,
    stores.store_code,
    stores.store_name,
    stores.store_address,
    stores.contact_phone,
    stores.working_hours,
    stores.timezone,
    stores.created_at,
    stores.updated_at
from stores as stores
inner join store_sellers as store_sellers
where
    store_sellers.seller_id = ${seller_id};

select  
    orders.order_id,
    orders.order_long_id,
    orders.order_short_id,
    orders.store_code,
    orders.store_name,
    orders.store_address,
	orders.contact_phone,
    orders.seller_id,
    orders.client_id,
    orders.loyalty_card,
    orders.client_phone,
    orders.total_points_amount,
    orders.order_status,
    orders.attributes,
	orders.commentary,
    orders.order_created_at,
    orders.order_created_timezone,
    orders.created_at,
    orders.updated_at,
    orders.source,
	orders.last_updated_by
   -- payments.payment_number,
   -- payments.payment_method,
   -- payments.amount,
   -- payments.currency,
   -- payments.final_status,
   -- payments.external_id,
   -- payments.created_at as payments_created_at,
  --  payments.updated_at as payments_updated_at
from orders as orders
    --left outer join payments as payments
    --on orders.order_short_id = payments.order_short_id
	--left outer join order_status_history as order_status_history
    --on orders.order_short_id = order_status_history.order_short_id
--and
where
    orders.order_short_id = '${order_short_id}'
	-- and orders.order_status <> 'confirmation_verified'
;

UPDATE payment_confirmations
SET
	confirmation_status = '${action}'
	,last_updated_by = '${source}'
WHERE confirmation_short_id = '${confirmation_short_id}'

SELECT
	confirmation_id,
    confirmation_long_id,
    confirmation_short_id,
    payment_short_id,
    order_short_id,
    client_phone,
    send_code,
    entered_code,
    confirmation_status,
    attempts,
    max_attempts,
    expiration_time,
    confirmed_at,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    source,
    last_updated_by
from payment_confirmations
where
	confirmation_short_id = '${confirmation_short_id}'

select  
    *
from orders as orders
where order_status = '${order_status}'

SELECT 
	order_id,
    order_long_id,
    order_short_id,
    store_code,
    store_name,
    store_address,
    contact_phone,
    seller_id,
    loyalty_card,
    client_id,
    client_phone,
    total_points_amount,
    order_status,
    attributes,
    commentary,
    order_created_at,
    order_created_timezone,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    source,
    last_updated_by
from orders
where
	order_long_id = '${order_long_id}'
SELECT order_long_id from orders where order_id = last_insert_rowid();
properties.sql-post-query:
UPDATE orders 
SET order_short_id = 
    (SELECT store_code FROM orders WHERE order_id = last_insert_rowid()) || 
    '-' || 
    strftime('%Y%m', 'now') || 
    '-' || 
    last_insert_rowid(),
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE order_id = last_insert_rowid();
properties.sql-pre-query:
INSERT INTO orders (
	order_long_id,
    store_code,
	store_name,
	store_address,
	contact_phone,
    seller_id,
    loyalty_card,
    client_phone,
    total_points_amount,
    attributes,
	commentary,
    order_created_at,
	order_created_timezone,
    last_updated_by
)
VALUES (
	'${order_long_id}',
    '${store_code}',
    '${store_name}',
    '${store_address}',
    '${contact_phone}',
    '${seller_id}',
    '${loyalty_card}',
    '${client_phone}',
    ${total_points_amount},
    '${attributes}',
    '${commentary}',
    '${creation_date}',
	'${timezone}',
    '${last_updated_by}'
);
